Definition: In this task, you will be given a news article. You will need to classify the article into one of the four topics: 'World', 'Sports', 'Business', or 'Sci/Tech'. If the article's main topic is relevant to the world, sports, business, or science/technology, correspondingly, choose that option. If you are not sure about the topic, choose the option that is closest to the article. Note that URLs in the text have been replaced with [Link].
